mapper.update:
update toa_machine_express set
EXPRESS_NUMBER=#{expressNumber},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
COMPANY_ID=#{companyId},
MACHINA=#{machina},
CONTACT=#{contact},
TEL=#{tel},
TYPE=#{type},
DEVICE_DS=#{deviceDs},
PAY_TYPE=#{payType},
DEVICE_DF=#{deviceDf},
MONEY_TYPE=#{moneyType},
EXPRESS_PEOPLE=#{expressPeople},
EXPRESS_ADDRESS=#{expressAddress},
DAIFU_PAY=#{daifuPay},
EXPRESS_DATE=#{expressDate},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},
REMARK=#{remark},
STATUS=#{status},
PREPOSE=#{prepose},
PREPOSE_LINK=#{preposeLink},
EXPRESS_COMPANY=#{expressCompany},
EXPRESS_CENTRAL=#{expressCentral},
SENDER=#{sender},
DRAWEE=#{drawee},
INSURANCE=#{insurance},
SITUATION=#{situation},
PACKING_MODEL=#{packingModel},
ORDER_DATE=#{orderDate},
COMPLETION_DATE=#{completionDate},
CHECK_ACCEPT=#{checkAccept},
CHECK_OTHER=#{checkOther},
CHECK_ACCEPTTANCE=#{checkAccepttance},
SIGN_RECEIVER=#{signReceiver},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
